Title: Lily White
Content:
Lily White

southpole ..... January 31, 2009

Later: Last Arrivals
Earlier: In a Dry and Waterless Place

Followup to yesterday’s post: then there are the times when you are quietly pedaling the stationary bike in the gym while your iPod plays your favorite audiobook, and a couple of lily-white guys (did I mention it’s mostly lily-white guys here?) come in and crank up some of the more vulgar and un-musical hip-hop on the gym stereo.

This is a place of compromises.

Earlier: In a Dry and Waterless Place
Author: John Jacobsen
